snippet: “It’s a great feeling because you can just float,” says Jessica Jerome of the United States, who will be competing in the first women’s ski jumping competition at an Olympics.

byline.original: By JOE WARD, MIKA GRÖNDAHL, GRAHAM ROBERTS and ALEXANDRA GARCIA

lead_paragraph: “It’s a great feeling because you can just float,” says Jessica Jerome of the United States, who will be competing in the first women’s ski jumping competition at an Olympics.

headline.main: Ski Jumping at 60 Miles an Hour
